script:
1). Why did they let Marcia go?
She wasn't doing a very good job. 
Marcia went to the bathroom.
They didn't ask her to come.
2). You couldn't finish the report by tomorrow, could you?
I think I could. 
No, I wouldn't.
I couldn't have done it.
3). I don't get how this machine works!
Get a new one.
Let me see if I can help. 
I haven't gotten it.
